MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L34, L36 postcode areas of Prescot, Knowsley and Huyton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.10am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9am on Oct 24, 2020.
